item.description:
Let's run on the Carriage Road along Comm Ave (the Marathon Route). It's nice and clear of snow for the most part.
We'll meet at the Auburndale Plaza on Comm Ave in the StarMarket parking lot. There is also Brueggers Bagels (we can even go for bagels after the run if anyone is interested). You can park in the parking lot or you can park on the carriage road across the Plaza.
We'll run up toward BC. It could be anywhere from 4 miles to 9 miles depending on how we all feel. We'll go at easy pace, start with 9-10min miles and see how it goes.
item.name: Saturday Morning Run
